decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly sacrificing creatures to trigger effects like Mayhem Devil and Bloodtithe Harvester, while also utilizing cards like Cauldron Familiar and Witch's Oven to generate value and disrupt the opponent's board. It also includes efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck aims to apply constant pressure on the opponent and maintain a strong board presence, using various sacrifice effects and synergies to overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory.

Utilizing a combination of counter spells, board wipes, and card advantage, the UW Control deck aims to control the game by disrupting the opponent's strategy and out-valuing them in the long run. By consistently answering threats with cards like Dovin's Veto and Supreme Verdict, while also generating card advantage through cards like Memory Deluge and Omen of the Sea, the deck aims to create a locked-down game state where the opponent is unable to execute their game plan effectively, leading to a victory through incremental advantage and control of the game.

This deck focuses on sacrificing creatures to generate value and pressure the opponent. By utilizing cards like Witch's Oven, Cauldron Familiar, and Mayhem Devil, the deck can create a loop of sacrificing and dealing damage to the opponent. The addition of Claim the Firstborn and Yagra, Eater of All allows for stealing and sacrificing the opponent's creatures as well. The deck aims to maintain board presence and control through sacrificing and utilizing various synergies within the Jund color combination.

This deck focuses on utilizing a fast and aggressive strategy using Human creatures. The key concept revolves around putting pressure on the opponent early in the game while disrupting their plan with cards like Kitesail Freebooter and Reflector Mage. Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Thalia's Lieutenant help to pump up your board and make it difficult for your opponent to play spells. With a mix of disruption, aggression, and synergy among Human creatures, this deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory.
